channel.title: Welcome, Space Cowboys on Neutrino Express - A Merc*Astra Company
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome, Space Cowboys on Neutrino Express - A Merc*Astra Company

item.title: Discrete Animal Acquisition
item.description: Discrete Animal Acquisition Location: Gripp, Mnepholem System Payout: R3 Description: An anonymous client wants to obtain a Jungle Gardens monkey as a pet. Animal must be healthy and be delivered in good condition.

item.title: Merchandise Recovery
item.description: Merchandise Recovery Location: Elltooine, Celeschul System Payout: R4 Description: The Planet Mercenary outlet on Elltooine has lost contact with one of its Customer Activation shuttles. Find it, and bring it back. Quietly, please. Do not loot it.

item.title: Paul Fart Mall Cop
item.description: Hey Space Cowboys! We’ve got a new bounty for y’all. Go do MALL THINGS. In a MALL.
